events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred yesterday afternoon at a busy intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a car collision causing damages.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the car accident claim and to assist the customer with next steps.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident details.
We requested photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and driver's license to proceed with investigation.
The customer submitted all required documents including the collision photos and the official police report.
Investigation began to assess the extent of damage and verify the details provided about the auto accident.
The investigation was concluded confirming the validity of the claim and estimating repair costs.
A settlement proposal was sent to the customer outlining the payment amount to cover the vehicle repairs.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement for the auto damages.
The claim was formally approved after all verifications and customer agreements were completed successfully.
Payment was issued to the repair service provider to cover the costs of fixing the vehicle damages.
The auto accident claim was closed after full settlement and confirmation of repairs by the customer.
